scripts.dev:blockchain: python -m pip install --upgrade pip --quiet && python -m pip install -r services/cv-parser-service/requirements.txt --quiet --disable-pip-version-check && python services/blockchain-service/scripts/start_blockchain.py
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=apps/web" "npm run dev --workspace=services/auth-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/message-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/blockchain-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/booking-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/rag-service" "npm run dev --workspace=services/chatbot-service" "npm run dev:cv-parser-service"
scripts.dev:cv-parser-service: python -m pip install --upgrade pip --quiet && python -m pip install -r services/cv-parser-service/requirements.txt --quiet --disable-pip-version-check && python services/cv-parser-service/src/app.py
